title: Nextflow Pipeline Parameters
description: Parameters for Nextflow pipeline including paths to raw reads and organism information.

ONT_RAW_READS.description: Path to the combined Raw ONT FASTQ reads.

ILLUMINA_RAW_F_READS.description: Path to the Raw Forward Illumina Reads.

ILLUMINA_RAW_R_READS.description: Path to the Raw Reverse Illumina Reads.

SPECIES_ID.description: Species ID formatted as <2-letters of Genus>_<full species name>.

ORGANISM_KINGDOM.description: Kingdom the current organism data belongs to.

COMPLEASM_1.description: Name of the first organism compleasm/BUSCO database to compare to.

COMPLEASM_2.description: Name of the second organism compleasm/BUSCO database to compare to.

EST_SIZE.description: Estimated size of the genome in Mbp.

REF_SEQ.description: Path to the reference genome for assembly.
